commit.message:
re PR middle-end/45687 (possible wrong code bug)

gcc/:
	PR middle-end/45687
	* ipa-prop.c (ipa_modify_call_arguments): Correct type of MEM_REF
	offset.
gcc/testsuite:
	* gcc.c-torture/execute/20101025-1.c: New test.

From-SVN: r165964
